channel.title: Tragic Tango on Simba Tango

item.title: Why the Chileans love tango
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ f _ d a y --Do you know why the Chileans love tango? I have made a couple of Chilean friends lately, and that means opportunities to practice my castellano. In all countries, the residents make jokes about their neighbours, and one of my new friends told me this one. Another invited us to his asado (or bbq as they say here), and kept insisting on me saying** **tu, not vos like in Argentina.
